org.apache.pig.tools.pigstats.mapreduce
Class SimplePigStats

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pig.tools.pigstats.PigStats
      org.apache.pig.tools.pigstats.mapreduce.SimplePigStats

public final class SimplePigStats
extends PigStats

SimplePigStats encapsulates the statistics collected from a running script. It includes status of the execution, the DAG of its MR jobs, as well as information about outputs and inputs of the script.
